name: Angelic Favor
text: If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay Angelic Favor's mana cost.\nCast Angelic Favor only during combat.\nPut a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying onto the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Avenger en-Dal
text: {2}{W}, {T}, Discard a card: Exile target attacking creature. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

name: Blinding Angel
text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\nWhenever Blinding Angel deals combat damage to a player, that player skips his or her next combat phase.
flavor: "Their eyes will shrivel and blacken before faith's true light."

name: Chieftain en-Dal
text: Whenever Chieftain en-Dal attacks, attacking creatures gain first strike until end of turn.
flavor: The clearest commands are practical examples.

name: Defender en-Vec
text: Fading 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)\nRemove a fade counter from Defender en-Vec: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

name: Defiant Falcon
text: Flying\n{4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Defiant Vanguard
text: When Defiant Vanguard blocks, at end of combat, destroy it and all creatures it blocked this turn.\n{5}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 4 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Fanatical Devotion
text: Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate target creature.
flavor: The Oracle told Eladamri he would save his people by abandoning them. His followers adopted that ideal.

name: Lashknife
text: If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay Lashknife's mana cost.\nEnchant creature\nEnchanted creature has first strike.
flavor: Those it won't scare, it scars.

name: Lawbringer
text: {T}, Sacrifice Lawbringer: Exile target red creature.
flavor: One injustice starts a thousand riots. One law stops a thousand crimes.\n—Lawbringer creed

name: Lightbringer
text: {T}, Sacrifice Lightbringer: Exile target black creature.
flavor: One thought opens a thousand eyes. One sun brings a thousand dawns.\n—Lightbringer creed

name: Lin Sivvi, Defiant Hero
text: {X}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.\n{3}: Put target Rebel card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library.

name: Netter en-Dal
text: {W}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature can't attack this turn.
flavor: The wizard's vocabulary of mogg profanities increased with every net she cast.

name: Noble Stand
text: Whenever a creature you control blocks, you gain 2 life.
flavor: Soldiers will always endanger their lives to defend many other lives.

name: Off Balance
text: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.
flavor: A heavy weapon deals plenty of damage—but it does have to hit.

name: Oracle's Attendants
text: {T}: All damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn by a source of your choice is dealt to Oracle's Attendants instead.
flavor: The future isn't sacred, but its speaker is.

name: Parallax Wave
text: Fading 5 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)\nRemove a fade counter from Parallax Wave: Exile target creature.\nWhen Parallax Wave leaves the battlefield, each player returns to the battlefield all cards he or she owns exiled with Parallax Wave.

name: Seal of Cleansing
text: Sacrifice Seal of Cleansing: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: "I am the purifier, the light that clears all shadows."\n—Seal inscription

name: Silkenfist Fighter
text: Whenever Silkenfist Fighter becomes blocked, untap it.
flavor: Simple wooden staff\nMade from life, protecting life,\nStronger than cold steel.

name: Silkenfist Order
text: Whenever Silkenfist Order becomes blocked, untap it.
flavor: Hands weave life and death;\nIntertwining spirits knit\nTapestries and shrouds.

name: Sivvi's Ruse
text: If an opponent controls a Mountain and you control a Plains, you may cast Sivvi's Ruse without paying its mana cost.\nPrevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to creatures you control.

name: Sivvi's Valor
text: If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay Sivvi's Valor's mana cost.\nAll damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn is dealt to you instead.

name: Spiritual Asylum
text: Creatures and lands you control have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)\nWhen a creature you control attacks, sacrifice Spiritual Asylum.
flavor: Trapped in safety is still trapped.

name: Topple
text: Exile target creature with the greatest power among creatures on the battlefield. (If two or more creatures are tied for greatest power, target any one of them.)
flavor: "Let all witness the fate of those who defy me."\n—Crovax

name: Voice of Truth
text: Flying, protection from white
flavor: "Above them all is Truth, and Truth must be set free. If the wings of Truth are clipped, the voices will fall silent."\n—Song of All, canto 167

name: Accumulated Knowledge
text: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Accumulated Knowledge in all graveyards.
flavor: "I have seen and heard much here. There are secrets within secrets. Let me show you."\n—Takara, to Eladamri

name: Æther Barrier
text: Whenever a player casts a creature spell, that player sacrifices a permanent unless he or she pays {1}.
flavor: "Creatures fade in and out of existence. It's an unfortunate side effect. The losses are tolerable."\n—Belbe

name: Air Bladder
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature has flying.\nEnchanted creature can block only creatures with flying.
flavor: Random mutations among Rootwater merfolk were common—and disturbing.

name: Cloudskate
text: Flying\nFading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

name: Daze
text: You may return an Island you control to its owner's hand rather than pay Daze's mana cost.\nCounter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

name: Dominate
text: Gain control of target creature with converted mana cost X or less.
flavor: "I've come to reclaim what is mine. And you, Greven, are mine."\n—Volrath

name: Ensnare
text: You may return two Islands you control to their owner's hand rather than pay Ensnare's mana cost.\nTap all creatures.
flavor: Rootwater has become as dangerous to its denizens as to its enemies.

name: Infiltrate
text: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: Getting in was the easy part. Getting out proved to be more difficult.

name: Jolting Merfolk
text: Fading 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)\nRemove a fade counter from Jolting Merfolk: Tap target creature.

name: Oraxid
text: Protection from red
flavor: "I'm constantly amazed by the tenacity of living creatures on this plane. Even in the stronghold's white-hot core, life persists."\n—Ertai

name: Pale Moon
text: Until end of turn, if a player taps a nonbasic land for mana, it produces colorless mana instead of any other type.
flavor: Denizens of Rath had never seen the moon before. It was a symbol of change, not constancy.

name: Parallax Tide
text: Fading 5 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)\nRemove a fade counter from Parallax Tide: Exile target land.\nWhen Parallax Tide leaves the battlefield, each player returns to the battlefield all cards he or she owns exiled with Parallax Tide.

name: Rising Waters
text: Lands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.\nAt the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player untaps a land he or she controls.
flavor: Rising waters, sinking hope.

name: Rootwater Commando
text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor: Rootwater merfolk are seldom seen these days, but elf corpses are as numerous as ever.

name: Rootwater Thief
text: {U}: Rootwater Thief gains flying until end of turn.\nWhenever Rootwater Thief deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}. If you do, search that player's library for a card and exile it, then the player shuffles his or her library.

name: Seahunter
text: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Merfolk permanent card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: "They can't feel pain. They just wiggle 'cause they're scared."

name: Seal of Removal
text: Sacrifice Seal of Removal: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: "I am the unraveler, the loosened thread that will not hold."\n—Seal inscription

name: Sliptide Serpent
text: {3}{U}: Return Sliptide Serpent to its owner's hand.
flavor: It's futile to fight something you can see only in the corner of your eye.

name: Sneaky Homunculus
text: Sneaky Homunculus can't block or be blocked by creatures with power 2 or greater.
flavor: Keep watch only for the giants and you'll be eaten by the ants.

name: Stronghold Biologist
text: {U}{U}, {T}, Discard a card: Counter target creature spell.
flavor: He twists the laws of nature until they scream.

name: Stronghold Machinist
text: {U}{U}, {T}, Discard a card: Counter target noncreature spell.
flavor: She stretches the laws of physics until they snap.

name: Stronghold Zeppelin
text: Flying\nStronghold Zeppelin can block only creatures with flying.
flavor: As long as the stronghold controlled the sky, the rebels were doomed.

name: Submerge
text: If an opponent controls a Forest and you control an Island, you may cast Submerge without paying its mana cost.\nPut target creature on top of its owner's library.

name: Trickster Mage
text: {U}, {T}, Discard a card: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
flavor: "If it ain't broke, I'll break it. If it is broke, I'll fix it."

name: Wandering Eye
text: Flying\nPlayers play with their hands revealed.
flavor: The evincar has many ways of keeping track of his subjects.

name: Ascendant Evincar
text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\nOther black creatures get +1/+1.\nNonblack creatures get -1/-1.
flavor: "Things are going to change around here."\n—Crovax

name: Battlefield Percher
text: Flying\nBattlefield Percher can block only creatures with flying.\n{1}{B}: Battlefield Percher gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Belbe's Percher
text: Flying\nBelbe's Percher can block only creatures with flying.
flavor: Long and powerful, these birds were used to carry messages to and from the evincar.

name: Carrion Wall
text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\n{1}{B}: Regenerate Carrion Wall.
flavor: A wall built from the bodies of the enemy will never lack building material in times of war.

name: Dark Triumph
text: If you control a Swamp, you may sacrifice a creature rather than pay Dark Triumph's mana cost.\nCreatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: All that's left is the coronation.

name: Death Pit Offering
text: When Death Pit Offering enters the battlefield, sacrifice all creatures you control.\nCreatures you control get +2/+2.
flavor: "Kill them all and feed them to the new recruits."\n—Crovax

name: Divining Witch
text: {1}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Name a card. Exile the top six cards of your library. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal the named card, then put that card into your hand. Exile all other cards revealed this way.

name: Massacre
text: If an opponent controls a Plains and you control a Swamp, you may cast Massacre without paying its mana cost.\nAll creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

name: Mind Slash
text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor: "I can't think with all that screaming."

name: Mind Swords
text: If you control a Swamp, you may sacrifice a creature rather than pay Mind Swords's mana cost.\nEach player exiles two cards from his or her hand.

name: Murderous Betrayal
text: {B}{B}, Pay half your life, rounded up: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: In darkness, the assassin sneaked into the village and destroyed what Eladamri loved most: his daughter.

name: Parallax Dementia
text:
Enchant creature
Fading 1 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with one fade counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
Enchanted creature gets +3/+2.
When Parallax Dementia leaves the battlefield, destroy enchanted creature. That creature can't be regenerated.

name: Parallax Nexus
text: Fading 5 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)\nRemove a fade counter from Parallax Nexus: Target opponent exiles a card from his or her hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.\nWhen Parallax Nexus leaves the battlefield, each player returns to his or her hand all cards he or she owns exiled with Parallax Nexus.

name: Phyrexian Driver
text: When Phyrexian Driver enters the battlefield, other Mercenary creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Although the abuse was initially effective, the troops soon became numb to it.

name: Phyrexian Prowler
text: Fading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)\nRemove a fade counter from Phyrexian Prowler: Phyrexian Prowler gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Plague Witch
text: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: "I can ail what cures you."

name: Rathi Assassin
text: {1}{B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target tapped nonblack creature.\n{3}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Rathi Fiend
text: When Rathi Fiend enters the battlefield, each player loses 3 life.\n{3}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Rathi Intimidator
text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)\n{2}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 2 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Seal of Doom
text: Sacrifice Seal of Doom: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: "I am the banisher, the ill will that snuffs the final candle."\n—Seal inscription

name: Spineless Thug
text: Spineless Thug can't block.
flavor: These troops are only as strong as the evincar's control.

name: Spiteful Bully
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Spiteful Bully deals 3 damage to target creature you control.
flavor: Like most creatures bent on total destruction, they rarely bother to double-check their targets.

name: Stronghold Discipline
text: Each player loses 1 life for each creature he or she controls.
flavor: "Crovax never passes up an opportunity to cause widespread misery."\n—Belbe

name: Vicious Hunger
text: Vicious Hunger deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.
flavor: "Blood is foul, the flesh dross. My ascendance thirsts for life itself."\n—Crovax

name: Volrath the Fallen
text: {1}{B}, Discard a creature card: Volrath the Fallen gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the discarded card's converted mana cost.
flavor: "I stepped out. I did not step down."

name: Ancient Hydra
text: Fading 5 (This creature enters the battlefield with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)\n{1}, Remove a fade counter from Ancient Hydra: Ancient Hydra deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

name: Arc Mage
text: {2}{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Arc Mage deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.

name: Bola Warrior
text: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature can't block this turn.
flavor: The ingredients for panic include equal parts danger, uncertainty, and helplessness.

name: Downhill Charge
text: You may sacrifice a Mountain rather than pay Downhill Charge's mana cost.\nTarget creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Mountains you control.

name: Flame Rift
text: Flame Rift deals 4 damage to each player.
flavor: Crovax hungered for power, and the stronghold devoured the sky.

name: Flowstone Crusher
text: {R}: Flowstone Crusher gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: "Someone must have done something very bad to make a rock that angry."\n—Rebel scout

name: Flowstone Overseer
text: {R}{R}: Target creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: The rebels couldn't see where the roar was coming from. Then they saw it was coming from everywhere.

name: Flowstone Slide
text: All creatures get +X/-X until end of turn.
flavor: It may look like soil, but its nature is malice.

name: Flowstone Strike
text: Target creature gets +1/-1 and gains haste until end of turn.
flavor: Aggression exacts its toll.

name: Flowstone Surge
text: Creatures you control get +1/-1.
flavor: The army was never at a loss for weapons; Crovax was their forge.

name: Flowstone Wall
text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\n{R}: Flowstone Wall gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: The rebels assaulted the wall, never suspecting the wall would assault back.

name: Laccolith Grunt
text: Whenever Laccolith Grunt becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Grunt assigns no combat damage this turn.
flavor: They leave a trail of ash and sorrow.

name: Laccolith Rig
text: Enchant creature\nWhenever enchanted creature becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, the first creature assigns no combat damage this turn.

name: Laccolith Titan
text: Whenever Laccolith Titan becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Titan assigns no combat damage this turn.
flavor: Proximity guarantees injury or death.

name: Laccolith Warrior
text: Whenever Laccolith Warrior becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Warrior assigns no combat damage this turn.
flavor: The screams are brief. The silence lingers.

name: Laccolith Whelp
text: Whenever Laccolith Whelp becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Whelp assigns no combat damage this turn.
flavor: They don't feed; they stoke.

name: Mana Cache
text: At the beginning of each player's end step, put a charge counter on Mana Cache for each untapped land that player controls.\nRemove a charge counter from Mana Cache: Add {C} to your mana pool. Any player may activate this ability but only during his or her turn before the end step.

name: Mogg Alarm
text: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay Mogg Alarm's mana cost.\nPut two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
flavor: They make mountains into mogg holes.

name: Mogg Salvage
text: If an opponent controls an Island and you control a Mountain, you may cast Mogg Salvage without paying its mana cost.\nDestroy target artifact.
flavor: Three moggs, one treasure, too bad.

name: Mogg Toady
text: Mogg Toady can't attack unless you control more creatures than defending player.\nMogg Toady can't block unless you control more creatures than attacking player.

name: Moggcatcher
text: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Goblin permanent card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: "They're not worth much, but they're easy to catch."

name: Rupture
text: Sacrifice a creature. Rupture deals damage equal to that creature's power to each creature without flying and each player.
flavor: All creatures have an inner fire. Releasing it can be dangerous.

name: Seal of Fire
text: Sacrifice Seal of Fire: Seal of Fire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: "I am the romancer, the passion that consumes the flesh."\n—Seal inscription

name: Shrieking Mogg
text: Haste\nWhen Shrieking Mogg enters the battlefield, tap all other creatures.
flavor: You have to admire its enthusiasm.

name: Stronghold Gambit
text: Each player chooses a card in his or her hand. Then each player reveals his or her chosen card. The owner of each creature card revealed this way with the lowest converted mana cost puts it onto the battlefield.

name: Animate Land
text: Until end of turn, target land becomes a 3/3 creature that's still a land.
flavor: Irony is getting walked on by the earth instead of the other way around.

name: Blastoderm
text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)\nFading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

name: Coiling Woodworm
text: Coiling Woodworm's power is equal to the number of Forests on the battlefield.
flavor: Only the elves know where the woods end and the woodworm begins.

name: Fog Patch
text: Cast Fog Patch only during the declare blockers step.\nAttacking creatures become blocked. (This spell works on creatures that can't be blocked.)
flavor: Realizing they weren't getting past the fog, the elves did the only thing they could do: wait.

name: Harvest Mage
text: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Until end of turn, if you tap a land for mana, it produces one mana of a color of your choice instead of any other type and amount.
flavor: "Why should one limit oneself to the resources at hand?"

name: Mossdog
text: Whenever Mossdog becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, put a +1/+1 counter on Mossdog.
flavor: The more you look at it, the more dangerous it becomes.

name: Nesting Wurm
text: Trample\nWhen Nesting Wurm enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Nesting Wurm, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: Overlaid Terrain
text: As Overlaid Terrain enters the battlefield, sacrifice all lands you control.\nLands you control have "{T}: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool."
flavor: One must reap before one can sow.

name: Pack Hunt
text: Search your library for up to three cards with the same name as target creature, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: The one you see is just a diversion.

name: Refreshing Rain
text: If an opponent controls a Swamp and you control a Forest, you may cast Refreshing Rain without paying its mana cost.\nTarget player gains 6 life.

name: Reverent Silence
text: If you control a Forest, rather than pay Reverent Silence's mana cost, you may have each other player gain 6 life.\nDestroy all enchantments.

name: Rhox
text: You may have Rhox assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.\n{2}{G}: Regenerate Rhox. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

name: Saproling Burst
text: Fading 7 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with seven fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)\nRemove a fade counter from Saproling Burst: Put a green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of fade counters on Saproling Burst."\nWhen Saproling Burst leaves the battlefield, destroy all tokens put onto the battlefield with Saproling Burst. They can't be regenerated.

name: Saproling Cluster
text: {1}, Discard a card: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield. Any player may activate this ability.

name: Seal of Strength
text: Sacrifice Seal of Strength: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor: "I am the feeder, the morsel that revives the starving."\n—Seal inscription

name: Skyshroud Behemoth
text: Fading 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)\nSkyshroud Behemoth enters the battlefield tapped.

name: Skyshroud Claim
text: Search your library for up to two Forest cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: The forest's constant struggle is to keep the spreading flowstone at bay.

name: Skyshroud Cutter
text: If you control a Forest, rather than pay Skyshroud Cutter's mana cost, you may have each other player gain 5 life.

name: Skyshroud Poacher
text: {3}, {T}: Search your library for an Elf permanent card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: "It's OK. They're just elves."

name: Skyshroud Ridgeback
text: Fading 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

name: Skyshroud Sentinel
text: When Skyshroud Sentinel enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Skyshroud Sentinel, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: Stampede Driver
text: {1}{G}, {T}, Discard a card: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.
flavor: "The thunder of hooves is music to my ears."

name: Treetop Bracers
text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.
flavor: Gravity is truly what you make of it.

name: Wild Mammoth
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player controls more creatures than each other player, the player who controls the most creatures gains control of Wild Mammoth.
flavor: "Sit. Heel! Down! HELP!"

name: Woodripper
text: Fading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)\n{1}, Remove a fade counter from Woodripper: Destroy target artifact.

name: Belbe's Armor
text: {X}, {T}: Target creature gets -X/+X until end of turn.
flavor: It protects her from the ravages of Phyrexia and the savages of Rath.

name: Belbe's Portal
text: As Belbe's Portal enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.\n{3}, {T}: You may put a creature card of the chosen type from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor: The fight will continue on a new battlefield.

name: Complex Automaton
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control seven or more permanents, return Complex Automaton to its owner's hand.
flavor: "This wasteful design cannot possibly be Phyrexian."\n—Belbe

name: Eye of Yawgmoth
text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Reveal a number of cards from the top of your library equal to the sacrificed creature's power. Put one into your hand and exile the rest.

name: Flint Golem
text: Whenever Flint Golem becomes blocked, defending player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

name: Flowstone Armor
text: You may choose not to untap Flowstone Armor during your untap step.\n{3}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/-1 for as long as Flowstone Armor remains tapped.

name: Flowstone Thopter
text: {1}: Flowstone Thopter gets +1/-1 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: Airborne flowstone isn't less dangerous, only less common.

name: Kill Switch
text: {2}, {T}: Tap all other artifacts. They don't untap during their controllers' untap steps for as long as Kill Switch remains tapped.
flavor: Success is largely a matter of knowing which lever to pull.

name: Parallax Inhibitor
text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Parallax Inhibitor: Put a fade counter on each permanent with fading you control.
flavor: "The best I can offer is a temporary reprieve."\n—Belbe

name: Predator, Flagship
text: {2}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.\n{5}, {T}: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor: "The scourge of Skyshroud is airborne once more."\n—Oracle en-Vec

name: Rackling
text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Rackling deals X damage to that player, where X is 3 minus the number of cards in his or her hand.
flavor: "This may hurt a little."

name: Rejuvenation Chamber
text: Fading 2 (This artifact enters the battlefield with two fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)\n{T}: You gain 2 life.

name: Rusting Golem
text: Fading 5 (This creature enters the battlefield with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)\nRusting Golem's power and toughness are each equal to the number of fade counters on it.

name: Tangle Wire
text: Fading 4 (This artifact enters the battlefield with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)\nAt the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player taps an untapped artifact, creature, or land he or she controls for each fade counter on Tangle Wire.

name: Viseling
text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Viseling deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand minus 4.
flavor: "This may hurt a lot."

name: Kor Haven
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{1}{W}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn.

name: Rath's Edge
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{4}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Rath's Edge deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

name: Terrain Generator
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{2}, {T}: You may put a basic land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
